part.Name: Description
part.Short: この人は風に彫られたような男であり、蔓刈りの体勢をしている。背筋は曲がり、明るいトルコ青色の瞳を耕作の角度に向け、腰は奇数度前に突き出し、まるで自分よりもずっと気安かった姿勢であり、まるで前かがみになっているかのようである。額についた塩の塊と、傷だらけの指関節がなければ、崩れかけた墓の下に腰掛けた大理石のサアドのように見える。

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: 水草農民 and Mechanimist 改宗者

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODO]=pronouns.Possessive= kufiya has been cut and resewn to a cowl, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:have:afterpronoun= tailored a vinewafer sack to approximate the slate habit of the chromaic people. A sheaf of watervine bundled in copper wire is slung on =pronouns.possessive= hip, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:rub:afterpronoun= a salt-nailed thumb over a talisman of cracked circuitboard.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODO]=pronouns.Possessive= kufiya has been cut and resewn to a cowl, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:have:afterpronoun= tailored an apple sack to approximate the slate habit of the chromaic people. A herding crook sheathed in copper wire is slung on =pronouns.possessive= hip, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:rub:afterpronoun= a salt-nailed thumb over a talisman of cracked circuitboard.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODO]A torn kufiya has been cut and resewn to a cowl, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:have:afterpronoun= tailored a knapsack to approximate the slate habit of the chromaic people. A human bone sheathed in copper wire is slung on =pronouns.possessive= hip, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:rub:afterpronoun= a salt-nailed thumb over a talisman of cracked circuitboard.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODO]=pronouns.Possessive= kufiya has been cut and resewn to a cowl, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:have:afterpronoun= tailored a tattered banner to approximate the slate habit of the chromaic people. A bronze dagger sheathed in copper wire is slung on =pronouns.possessive= hip, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:rub:afterpronoun= a salt-nailed thumb over a talisman of cracked circuitboard.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODO]Tussocks of fur dress skin stretched over taut muscle. Upright =pronouns.subjective= =verb:stand:afterpronoun=, but =pronouns.subjective= =verb:look:afterpronoun= ready to drop onto fours. =pronouns.Possessive= snout snarls and =pronouns.possessive= ears twitch. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:bark:afterpronoun=, and =pronouns.possessive= hyena tribeskin answer.

xtagTextFragments.Activity: hunting and gathering,raiding villages,howling at the Beetle Moon,picking the meat off bones
xtagTextFragments.VillageActivity: sleeping in our bedrolls and sitting in our chairs,lounging around,reading books,peeling and eating musa,howling at the moon,picking the meat off discarded bones
xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: for my own collection,to slake my greed,because of its trade value,to inspire my art,to inspire my poetry,to snarl at meaninglessly,as something to howl at,to be my muse,to help with farm work,for the games we play under the Beetle Moon
xtagTextFragments.SacredThing: the act of procreating,philosophy,the tilled land of others,howling at the Beetle Moon,snarling,picking the meat from bones,alcohol,grains of the earth,stone fruit,artistry,poetry,warm meals,bread and wine,pottery,painting
xtagTextFragments.ArableLand: defenseless villages,hapless farmers,the homes of sedentary creatures

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODO]A mound of wet fur and rotting flesh puts some elevation to the ground.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: [届：\TODO]The bite burst into so many strands of sinew.
